summary:
Playing cards are small, marked pieces of paper or plastic used for games. The most common type in the West is the 52-card French deck, used for games like poker. Other countries have their own traditional decks, like German or Italian cards, and Tarot cards are popular in Europe for games and divination.

Cards are usually designed with a pattern on the back to prevent players from seeing through them. They can also be customized for competitions, magic tricks, or as collectibles, making them a versatile tool for entertainment and hobbies.
title: Playing card
